wikipedia_page.main: Martin James Buchan (born 3 April 1977) is a Scottish footballer who played as a midfielder for Aberdeen, Dundee United, Partick Thistle, Montrose, Peterhead and Cove Rangers. He also represented the Scotland Under-21 team. He is the son of former Manchester United and Scotland player Martin Buchan.

response: Buchan's brother GeorgeGeorge Buchan, AFC Heritage Trust and father Martin seniorMartin Buchan [1], AFC Heritage Trust both played for Aberdeen, the latter only in unofficial competitions during World War II. His son Jamie played with Aberdeen, Dundee United and Partick Thistle.Jamie Buchan, AFC Heritage Trust
